summary:
In this Mod there are 3 Amazingly covered songs done by gifted guitarist that I have made into 
Title screen replacements.
descriptionHtml:
I have something special here for you guys.

In this Mod there are 3 Amazingly covered songs done by gifted guitarist that I have made into 
Title screen replacements.

There is:

Requiem for a Dream meets metal,
http://file3.guildlaunch.net/320450/Requiem%20for%20a%20Dream%20%28Lux%20Aeterna%29%20Meets%20Metal.mp3

Castlevania meets metal,
http://file3.guildlaunch.net/320450/Castlevania%20Meets%20Metal.mp3  

and the one I love the most!

Skyrim meets metal,
http://file3.guildlaunch.net/320450/Skyrim%20Meets%20Metal.mp3

All of these songs were covered by: 331Erock

They can be found on youtube as well.

Thanks to:

Bethesda and the other game developers for making these games 

and to 331Erock for making them METAL!!!

Installation is simple, open the file of the song you want to be your new title and copy the \"Music\"
file into your Skyrim/ Data file and load the game, That easy ;)

If you like the music be sure to pay 331Erock credit and respect for it.

All I did was take the time to convert it and upload it for you.

Enjoy <3
author: MissAshlay
